rows.label: tlk43400012_05_msg0001
rows.name: Well, this certainly is a problem...

rows.label: tlk43400012_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Cases of merchant vessels being
attacked in the night and dragged
into the sea are on the rise.

rows.label: tlk43400012_05_msg0004
rows.name:
they say deep-sea Serprond are
responsible for the incidents.

rows.label: tlk43400012_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Ordinary men like us wouldn't stand
a chance against them, it seems.

rows.label: tlk43400012_05_msg0006
rows.name:
But perhaps Drivers like you could set
them straight...

rows.label: tlk43400012_05_msg0007
rows.name: Thanks. I was hoping you'd say that.

rows.label: tlk43400012_05_msg0008
rows.name:
Here's hoping you can teach those
Serprond a lesson.
